Text: Property transfer tax revenue decreased by $315 million, or 14.7 per cent  -  a shift the government attributed to weaker housing sales.
Effect: Property transfer tax revenue decreased by $315 million, or 14.7 per cent
Sentence: <e2>Property transfer tax revenue decreased by $315 million, or 14.7 per cent</e2>  -  a shift the government attributed to <e1>weaker housing sales.</e1>
